name: Santas sEGGway
description:
This game was made as part of the itch.io Secret Santa Jam 2021

The game was originally intended for another participant who wanted something similar to games like Undertale/Deltarune

As this participant left the jam and limited time meant I wouldn't be able to create a new game for someone else this game will largely be for those participating who have been left without a game to play!

This game features high intensity Egg gameplay and top of the line MS Paint art assets!!!

With the terrifying goal of traversing through a store during the holidays in your quest to find a box of eggs

So come one come all and take part in some eggciting festive cheer!

Tools Used in Development:

Unity 2020.1.7f1

Visual Studio 2019

Microsoft Paint

Developed by - Sean Brennan (Genrely)

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
